title: Ticket #7765: Remove C bindings for internal APIs
description: A lot of our functions have C linkage and some of our header files hide C++ symbols when included in C source files. This is due to our lineage of C source code, the last of which disappeared with the standard universe. Most of this is now clutter that can be removed. But we need to be careful to leave in C-linkage that's visible to external code (unless we want to discourage external usage).
creator: jfrey
